summary: This document is an email exchange between two individuals, forwarding a quote from a New York Times article. The quote describes an alleged incident where Ghislaine Maxwell performed a massage on a woman named Mike Baker, during which Maxwell exposed and massaged the woman's breasts, while Jeffrey Epstein was reportedly present in the area.

persons.name: Mike Baker
persons.context: The individual recounting an alleged incident where Ghislaine Maxwell performed an inappropriate massage on her, exposing and massaging her breasts, with Jeffrey Epstein present nearby.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as performing a massage on Mike Baker, during which she exposed and massaged Baker's breasts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as being present in the area during the alleged inappropriate massage performed by Ghislaine Maxwell on Mike Baker.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: The recipient of the initial email, requesting a resend of a quote from the New York Times about Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Maxwell is alleged to have performed an inappropriate, sexualized massage on Baker.
Epstein was present in the area during the alleged incident involving Maxwell and Baker.
Baker felt Epstein's presence and believed he could see her during the alleged inappropriate massage.

events.title: Alleged Inappropriate Massage by Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell performed a massage on Mike Baker, during which she exposed Baker's breasts and massaged her chest, while Jeffrey Epstein was present in the vicinity.

keyFacts: Mike Baker alleges Ghislaine Maxwell performed a massage on her that involved exposing and massaging her breasts.
Jeffrey Epstein was reportedly present in the area during this alleged incident, leading Baker to believe he could see her.
The account is being referenced in an email between individuals, one of whom is U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman, who requested the quote.
The source of the quote is indicated to be the New York Times.
